about_the_game:
With the Supporter Package, you'll gain access to:

Practice Mode: Infinite feathers, keys, & the ability to teleport to any location

Enabling practice mode gives players unlimited feathers and keys so that parts of the game can be practiced. Players will also have an on-screen option to set a specific location and teleport there.

Pot Cosmetic Options

Discover and gain access to a diverse range of cosmetic enhancements for Pot, ensuring that his charming and endearing appearance is maintained and even amplified, no matter the style you choose.

Custom Trail Colors

Personalize your experience by setting unique and custom colors for both the standard color trail as well as the distinct coyote time color trail, allowing for a tailored look that aligns with your preferences.
